Hello World!

Apr. 21, 2023. Hello World! Welcome to my website! I am Huong Luong, a business data analyst. Data is always my passion and an important part of my career. I love analyzing data to find answers for business questions and help making data-driven business decisions. My go-to tools are Excel, Tableau, Tableau Prep.
